# Weekendavisen Book Award

The Weekendavisen Book Award (Danish: Weekendavisens litteraturpris) is an annual literary award presented by the Danish newspaper Weekendavisen ("The Weekend Newspaper"). The nominees are selected in December by Weekendavisens corps of literary critics, and the final winner is selected by the readers. The ceremony takes place in January the following year.
